sentences.sContent: They climbed the garish, purple-carpeted stairs.
sentences.sCn: 他们登上了那些铺着耀眼紫色地毯的楼梯。

synos.tran: 炫耀的；过分装饰的；过分鲜艳的

remMethod.val: gar(花) + ish → 花哨的 → 俗丽的； 注意不要和garnish(v. 装饰)相混

words.tran: 为增加色香味而添加的配菜；装饰品

trans.tranCn: 炫耀的, 过分装饰的, (色彩、装饰、打扮等)俗气的
trans.tranOther: You describe something as garish when you dislike it because it is very bright in an unattractive, showy way
